meanings.definition: A quick closing and opening of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: She gave a few eyewinks to signal her friend.
meanings.sent2: His eyewinks showed his excitement during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyewinks seemed to say, 'I see you!'
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky were like tiny eyewinks of light.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's eyewinks added humor to his performance.

meanings.definition: To close and open the eyes quickly.
meanings.sent1: He would eyewinks to catch the attention of his teacher.
meanings.sent2: The child would eyewinks when playing peek-a-boo.
meanings.sent3: The magician would eyewinks before making something disappear.
meanings.sent4: The fireflies seemed to eyewinks in the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The dancer would eyewinks in time with the music.
